title: Create NFT Liquidity Mining Product
body:
We've got an idea to create an entirely new liquidity mining product! typically, liquidity mining and benefits are for inflationary tokens, and generally miners provide liquidity, and then stake their LP tokens to earn more native tokens from the project. I propose making a new style liquidity mining product, that would incorporate fees accruing to the parachute DAO, specifically around staking LP tokens to create a unique NFT!
Unlike earning more tokens of the project, the miner stakes their LP tokens which now backs a NFT. The NFT would also need a unique art component, and this would require additional resources to build art dedicated to this cause. 
What does this do? The NFT not only has stake value based on the LP tokens used to generate the NFT that are also Owned by the NFT (so selling the NFT sells the LP tokens!), but also has value in the artwork that is used to represent it. 
This is a heat check on a potential product to build, whereupon the DAO can next look to find human resources to physically build this product and how much capital to allocate, and how to structure the revenue stream. I would suggest a committee oversight in addition to the build committee to bring the business and revenue elements into perspective and make sure all incentives are aligned.
author: 0x5944A50f736aA23a482E8618682B213f65D9E50a
